io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.net.login

Interface UserServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalDiskUserServer, MultiUserServer, MultiUserServer.DownServer, WebUserServer

    public interface UserServer

    An interface providing methods for accessing login servers.

    Login Tokens should not be shared with other servers but a connect token may be.

    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String INVALID_TOKEN
      Tokens used for invalid requests.

    • Method Detail

      • getLoginToken

        java.lang.String getLoginToken(java.lang.String login,
                               java.lang.String password)
        Gets a token for logging in.
        Parameters:
        login - The username/email of the user.
        password - The password of the user.
        Returns:
        A valid token or "ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff" if the login was invalid.

      • isValidToken

        boolean isValidToken(java.lang.String token)
        Determines if a token is valid.
        Parameters:
        token - The token to check.
        Returns:
        true if the token is valid, false otherwise.

      • getConnectToken

        java.lang.String getConnectToken(java.lang.String token)
        Gets a single-use token for connecting to a server.
        Parameters:
        token - The normal login token.
        Returns:
        A valid connect token or "ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff" if the login token was invalid.

      • isValidConnectToken

        boolean isValidConnectToken(java.lang.String token)
        Determines if a connect token is valid.
        Parameters:
        token - The token to check.
        Returns:
        true if the token is valid, false otherwise.

      • clearConnectToken

        void clearConnectToken(java.lang.String token)
        Removes and invalidates a connect token.
        Parameters:
        token - The token to invalidate.

      • getUserID

        long getUserID(java.lang.String login)
        Gets the user ID from a login.
        Parameters:
        login - The user login.
        Returns:
        A 64bit integer. -1 is reserved as an invalid ID.

      • getUserIDToken

        long getUserIDToken(java.lang.String token)
        Gets the user ID from a token.
        Parameters:
        token - The login token.
        Returns:
        A 64bit integer. -1 is reserved as an invalid ID.

      • getUserIDToken2

        long getUserIDToken2(java.lang.String token)
        Gets the user ID from a connect token.
        Parameters:
        token - The login token.
        Returns:
        A 64bit integer. -1 is reserved as an invalid ID.

      • getUserIDUsername

        long getUserIDUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Gets the user ID from a username.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        Returns:
        A 64bit integer. -1 is reserved as an invalid ID.

      • getUsername

        java.lang.String getUsername(long id)
        Gets a user's name from their user ID.
        Parameters:
        id - A user ID.
        Returns:
        The user's username.

      • isUp

        boolean isUp()
        Determines if the server can be connected to.
        Returns:
        true if the server is available, false otherwise.
